(z. B. Kosten zur Wahrnehmung des Umgang: (such as exercise of access rights of parents who are separated).
- Eingliederungshilfen nach § 54 Abs. 1: - Social integration assistance according to § 54 Abs. 1 Satz 1 Nr. 1-3 of the twelfth book of the German Social Code (SGB XII).
- Leistungen zur Teilhabe am Arbeitslebe: - benefits which allow me to participate in working life according to § 33 of the ninth book of the German Social Code (SGB IX) **or**
- sonstige Hilfen zur Erlangung eines ge: - other assistance allowing me to find suitable employment **or**
- zwischen 18 und 24 Jahre alt und mache: - between the age of 18 and 24 and am receiving educational or vocational training or will receive it soon.
- zwischen 18 und 24 Jahre alt und macht: - between the age of 18 and 24 and is receiving educational or vocational training or will receive it soon.
Ansprüche gegenüber Sozialleistungsträge: Claims against social service authorities/family benefits department
Antrag auf Leistungen zur Sicherung des: Application for benefits to secure the cost of living according to the Second Book of the German Social Code (SGB II)
BIC und IBAN finden Sie in der Regel auf: BIC and IBAN can normally be found on your account statement
Berücksichtigen Sie hier die Person/en,: The following items apply to the persons belonging to the shared household apart from yourself. Since you are applying for benefits, you are assumed to have assumed representation for your shared household. This representation is no longer in effect when members of your shared household who are over 15 years of age tell the Jobcenter that they want to assume responsibility for their own interests themselves, e.g. submitting their own application (§ 38 SGB II). No data for persons represented is necessary here.
Bitte füllen Sie für jedes Kind unter 15: Please complete **attachment KI** for each child younger than 15 and **attachment WEP** for every other person you represent.
Bitte füllen Sie für sich und ggf. für j: Please fill out **Annex EK** for yourself and for each other person belonging to your shared household who is 15 or older. If any of these persons receives income from self-employment, please also fill out **Annex EKS**.
Bitte geben Sie den Namen und den Ort de: Please provide the name and the location of the court where the claim is pending.
Bitte legen Sie eine Mitgliedsbescheinig: Please attach a confirmation of your membership or a similar documentation of your health insurance. Alternatively, you can present your valid insurance card or electronic health card.
Bitte legen Sie einen Nachweis vor, aus: Please provide documentation of the expected delivery date.
Bitte legen Sie einen Nachweis vor, sofe: Please provide evidence if a decision has already been made concerning your application(s).
Bitte machen Sie Angaben zu Personen, mi: Please use **attachment HG** to provide information on the persons you are related to directly or by marriage.
Bitte tragen Sie Angaben über die Vermög: Please enter information about the assets of all persons in your shared household in **Annex VM**.
Bitte weisen Sie den Anspruch durch ents: Please provide corresponding evidence for the claim.
Dauer der Schulausbildung von - bis: Duration of school education from – until
Die Angaben sind freiwillig und nur erfo: This information is voluntary and only required if you wish to apply for increased need.
Die Angaben zur Telefonnummer und zur E-: Information regarding telephone number and e-mail address are voluntary.
Die Ausfüllhinweise und weiteren Anlagen: You will find explanations of how to complete the form and further attachments online at www.arbeitsagentur.de
Die Betreuung gilt für folgende Lebensbe: The assistance refers to the following areas of life:
Die nachfolgenden Angaben dienen der Prü: The following information facilitates the assessment of whether or not a claim to unemployment benefits might exist.
Ein Elternteil dieser Person lebt außerh: One parent of this person does not live in the household.
Ein nicht verheiratetes/nicht in einer e: A member of my household who is unmarried/not in a registered same-sex partnership is pregnant or provides care for a illegitimate child under the age of 3 and cannot work for this reason.
Eine Person in meinem Haushalt ist: One person in my household is
Falls ja, legen Sie bitte den Aufnahmebe: If your answer is yes/If you checked "yes", please attach a notification verifying your admission.
Falls ja, legen Sie bitte eine gültige B: If you checked "yes", please attach a valid certification.
Falls ja, legen Sie bitte entsprechende: If your answer is yes, please attach corresponding evidence (e.g. temporary resident permit, residence permit, suspension of deportation).
If your answer is yes, please attach corresponding evidence.
Folgende Aussagen treffen auf meine Beda: The following statements apply to my shared household:
Für alle anderen Personen, für die Sie k: Please use **attachment VE** for all other persons for whom you did not complete attachment KI or WEP.
Hier sind Mehrfachnennungen möglich. Bit: Multiple answers possible. Please provide appropriate documentation.
Ich befinde mich derzeit oder demnächst: I am currently or will soon be in a **stationary facility** (e.g. hospital, retirement home, correctional facility)
Ich benötige aus medizinischen Gründen e: For medical reasons, I require an **expensive diet**.
Ich bestätige die Richtigkeit der durch: I hereby confirm that the changes and amendments that were made by myself or an employee of the Jobcenter are correct, referring to sections:
Ich bestätige, dass die Angaben richtig: I hereby confirm that the information provided is correct.
Ich bin **Berechtigte/Berechtigter** nac: I am a **Beneficiary** according to the **Law for asylum seekers**.
Ich bin **Spätaussiedlerin/Spätaussiedle: I am a **late repatriate** and do not hold **German** citizenship yet.
Ich bin **nicht erwerbsfähig** und Inhab: I am **not able work** and have obtained identification according to § 69 Abs. 5 SGB IX with the **code G**.
Ich bin unter 25 Jahre alt und lebe mit: I am younger than 25 and live with my parents or one parent.
Ich bin – meiner Einschätzung nach – **g: I am - in my estimation - **physically** capable of working at least **three hours a day**.
Ich bzw. meine jetzige Partnerin/mein je: I or my current partner was married once and this marriage was divorced or this registered same-sex partnership was nullified.
Ich erhebe Ansprüche gegen einen (ehemal: I raise a claim against a (former) employer for pending wage or salary payments (e.g. if the employer was unable to pay/bankrupt) or for periods after resigning (e.g. pending settlements).
Ich füge diesem Antrag ... **Anlage/n KI: I attach ... **attachment/s KI** and ... **attachment/s WEP** to this form.
Ich habe einen Anspruch gegenüber Dritte: I am entitled to a claim against third parties (e.g. due to contractual payment entitlements or claims for compensation).
Ich habe für den Monat der Antragstellun: I have already applied/claimed for benefits
Ich habe regelmäßig einen **unabweisbare: I have a special need with is **irrefutable, recurrent, and not merely a single instance** which I am unable to compensate for with my own savings or from other sources
I have already **applied** for other benefits (such as Wohngeld (housing supplement), Arbeitslosengeld (unemployment allowance) according to to third book of the German Social Code (SGB III)) or **intend to submit an application**.
Ich lebe bzw. meine jetzige Partnerin/me: I live or my current partner lives seperated from the spouse or the registered same-sex partner.
Ich lebe mit meiner Partnerin/meinem Par: I live with my partner in a **Verantwortungs- und Einstehensgemeinschaft**  („consensual union”).
Ich lebe mit mindestens einem unverheira: I live with at least one unmarried child younger than 25.
Ich lebe zusammen mit meiner **Ehegattin: I live with my **spouse**. We are **not** permanently separated.
Ich lebe zusammen mit meiner **eingetrag: I live with my **registered same-sex life partner**. We do **not** live permanently separated from each other.
In meinem Haushalt wohnt/wohnen neben mi: There are other person/s living in my household who do/did not belong to the shared household, but to the common household.
Innerhalb der letzten 5 Jahre vor der An: Within the last five years prior to application
Leben Sie allein, dann gehen Sie bitte z: If you live alone, please continue with section 3.
Mindestens ein Elternteil lebt außerhalb: At least one parents does not live in the household.
Name der Person, für die Leistungen bean: Name of the person for whom the benefits were applied for
Nur vom Jobcenter auszufüllen: To be completed by Jobcenter only
Persönliche Daten der weiteren Person/en: Personal information of other people in my household
Rentenversicherungsnummer wurde beantrag: I have applied for a Rentenversicherungsnummer (Social Security Number)
SGB II-Leistungen werden in der Regel au: SGB II benefits are usually transferred to a single account.
Unterschrift der/des gesetzlichen Vertre: Signature of the legal representative of the minor applicant
Weitere Informationen finden Sie in den: For furhter information read the attached instructions on how to complete the form
Wenn Sie Arbeitslosengeld nach dem Dritt: If you have already applied for unemployment benefits according to the third book of the German Social Code (SGB III), please indicate this in **Section 6.4**. If unemployment benefits have already been granted, indicate this in **Annex EK Section 2**, even if you have entered a disqualification period. In either case, you need enter no information in Section **6.1**.
Wenn Sie Nein angekreuzt haben, besteht: If you checked “No”, you may not be entitled to receive SGB II benefits. In that case you can apply for benefits according to the Twelfth Book of the German Social Code (SGB XII).
Zutreffendes bitte ankreuzen: Please mark with a cross where applicable
habe ich **Angehörige gepflegt** (Pflege: I **provided care for relatives** (Care according to the eleventh book of the German Social Code (SGB XI)).
habe ich **Entgeltersatzleistungen** erh: I received **unemployment compensation** (e.g. sick pay, unemployment benefits according to the third book of the German Social Code (SGB III)
habe ich **Wehr- oder Ersatzdienst** gel: I was in **military or alternative service**.
war ich **sozialversicherungspflichtig**: I was **subject to social insurance contributions** in my employment.
